official_title: A resolution expressing the sense of the House of Representatives regarding semi-annual cost-of-living adjustments for Federal annuitants.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that the cost of living adjustments in annuities for retired Federal employees and in retired and retainer pay for members and former members of the uniformed services should be made semiannually.

titles.title: A resolution expressing the sense of the House of Representatives regarding semi-annual cost-of-living adjustments for Federal annuitants.
